Package pgrid.util.logging

Interface Summary
StringMessageHandler The string message handler interface is used by classes to received log messages.
 

Class Summary
FlushedStreamHandler This class extends the StreamHandler by flushing the stream after every published LogRecord.
LogFilter This Filter can be used to provide fine grain control over what is logged, beyond the control provided by log levels.
LogFormatter Formats a LogRecord into a plain text format, defined by a format pattern.
LogLevelFilter This Filter can be used to provide fine grain control over what is logged, beyond the control provided by log levels.
LogResources The Resources used by the LogFormatter.
StringHandler The string handler sends log messages to StringHandler for further usage.
